Steele is now demanding answers after saying he raised red flags with Oranga Tamariki before the tragedy.
Richard Sivell a no-show in Tauranga court over threats to kill Dame Jacinda Ardern https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/richard-sivell-a-no-show-in-tauranga-court-over-threats-to-kill-dame-jacinda-阿德恩/Y2KQUBCBSNFANDOULXJYX4W6UA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/richard-sivell-a-no-show-in-tauranga-court-over-threats-to-kill-dame-jacinda-阿德恩/Y2KQUBCBSNFANDOULXJYX4W6UA/ Sandra Conchie'I’ve got a noose with your name on it,' he wrote of Dame Jacinda Ardern during her term. Tue, 07 Jan 2025 03:49:51 +0000 Richard Trevor Sivell, 43, was due for sentencing in the Tauranga District Court after being found guilty of threatening to kill Jacinda Ardern and two other charges. Photo / NZME
